metadata.title: CVE-2022-41343 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: registerFont in FontMetrics.php in Dompdf before 2.0.1 allows remote fileinclusion because a URI validation failure does not halt font registration,as demonstrated by a @font-face rule.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
